item.title: Start Blogging
item.description: Just built this blog today with two main reasons: If I can’t remember, I should write it down. Recently, I started to believe the power of data visualization, inspired by Nicholas Felton’s personal annual reports. In such sense, I want to document and visualize my work, study, or even my life through all kinds of methods. Keep writing :) It should be fun!
